Package com.authenticket.authenticket.service.impl

Class TicketServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.authenticket.authenticket.service.impl.TicketServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
TicketService
@Service public class TicketServiceImpl extends Object implements TicketService
This class provides the implementation of the `TicketService` interface, which manages tickets.

    • allocateSeats

      public List<Ticket> allocateSeats(Integer eventId, String sectionId, Integer ticketsToPurchase)
      Allocate seats for a specified number of tickets in a section for an event.
      Specified by:
      allocateSeats in interface TicketService
      Parameters:
      eventId - The unique identifier of the event.
      sectionId - The unique identifier of the section.
      ticketsToPurchase - The number of tickets to allocate.
      Returns:
      A list of allocated `Ticket` entities.
      Throws:
      NonExistentException - If the event or section does not exist.
      IllegalArgumentException - If the number of tickets to purchase is outside the valid range or if seats are insufficient.

    • findConsecutiveSeatsOf

      public List<Ticket> findConsecutiveSeatsOf(Event event, Section section, Integer ticketCount) throws org.webjars.NotFoundException, NonExistentException
      Finds consecutive seats for the specified event and section.
      Specified by:
      findConsecutiveSeatsOf in interface TicketService
      Parameters:
      event - The event for which seats should be allocated.
      section - The section in the venue where seats should be allocated.
      ticketCount - The number of consecutive seats to allocate.
      Returns:
      A list of allocated ticket objects.
      Throws:
      org.webjars.NotFoundException - If the consecutive seats of the specified count are not found.
      NonExistentException - If there are issues with the event or section.
